sentences.sContent: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.sCn: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.sContent: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.sCn: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.sContent: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.sCn: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.sContent: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.sCn: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

words.tran: 催促；匆忙进行；急派（hurry的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 使加快，催促；急运，急派；匆忙，赶紧
trans.tranOther: to do something or go somewhere more quickly than usual, especially because there is not much time

trans.tranCn: 急忙， 匆忙， 仓促
